original_title: ほんとにあった！呪いのビデオ80
overview: 80th entry in the popular "Honto ni Atta! Noroi no Video" series. The top monopoly in the psychic horror documentary. Can you directly see the truth projected by the camera? " A video of a woman who posted "A Strangerant Girl" when she went to the lake with her mother more than 20 years ago. Eight other posted videos are included.
title: Honto ni Atta! Noroi No Video 80
